protocol.text: For each sample, shoot tissue from 9 plants was collected and ground in liquid N2.
Plants were sown on GM medium (MS salts + 1% sucrose)and grown for 9 days under continuous white light at 22 degrees celsius. Chemical treatments were performed 3 hours prior to sample harvesting.
RNA extracted with Tripure and LiCL precipitation. Dissolved in water.

protocol.type: nucleic acid hybridization to array protocol

protocol.text: Standard Affymetrix array scanning and MAS5 extraction
protocol.type: array scanning and feature extraction protocol

protocol.text: Chemical treatments were performed 3 hours before harvesting. DEX and CHX were added at a concentration of 60 micromolar. Equivalent volume of DMSO was used in mock treated control.
Shoot tissue was separated from root tissue with forceps.
